awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'

projects.name: A Sociometric AI Screening Tool to Risk-Stratify Infant Neurodevelopmental Trajectories (STARS)
projects.summary: Aiming to develop a screening tool
highlights: Developed a multimodal pipeline for emotion recognition on spontaneous infant-mother interaction videos
Analyzed infant's facial expressions w.r.t. cultural backgrounds, sexes, and ages
Adopted the Pyannote library for speaker diarization on infant-mother interaction
